explains: adj. 违抗的，反叛的，蔑视的

sentences.en: Defiant in their haughty and arrogant inaccessibility, they seem to shout: I dare you!
sentences.cn: 他们目中无人，高视阔步，似乎在叫喊：我敢说你！

sentences.en: She looked at him with a defiant air.
sentences.cn: 她用蔑视的神情望着他。

sentences.en: The terrorists sent a defiant message to the government.
sentences.cn: 恐怖主义者向政府发出了挑战书。
